description: returns information about a Windows registry key or property of a key

path.description: T h e   f u l l   r e g i s t r y   k e y   p a t h   i n c l u d i n g   t h e   h i v e   t o   s e a r c h   f o r .

name.description: The registry property name to get information for, the return json will not include the sub_keys and properties entries for the I(key) specified.
